title: Input schema of the Climate change news aggregator scraper

rssFeeds.title: RSS / Atom feeds
rssFeeds.description: Feed URLs to parse for news items (preferred).

startUrls.title: Start URLs (site pages)
startUrls.description: Optional listing or topic pages to crawl (news sections, topic pages, pressrooms).

keywords.title: Keywords / Topics
keywords.description: Keywords to match against articles (e.g., 'sea level', 'carbon capture'). Used to tag results.

deduplicateBy.title: Deduplicate by
deduplicateBy.description: Field used to deduplicate items before saving (url | title).

extractFullArticle.title: Extract full article text
extractFullArticle.description: If true, try to extract main article body and store it in Key-Value Store.

computeSentiment.title: Compute sentiment score
computeSentiment.description: If true, compute a simple sentiment score for summary/text.
